text: Leonid Filimonov (; 22 July 1935 â€“ 8 February 2022) was a Russian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party. He was Minister of Oil and Gas from 1989 to 1991. He also was in the Federation Council from 1994 to 1996 and in the Legislative Duma of Tomsk Oblast from 1997 to 2001. Filimonov died on 8 February 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia) Category:People from Tomsk Oblast
title: Leonid Filimonov
